Blacknightmare:

The femme did a brief sob and said while tears started to =
fell 

"I suspected your unpredictable nature since you save me when we fig=
ht to destroy the cannon and watch how do you fight agains the femme that I=
 suspect os your sister, but inspite of  I still love you"her tears fell an=
d she tembled when she regained her self control again, said "But now that =
you said that I have keep distance, I will keep distance, 'acuse I don't th=
ink to remain in a place where I have no reason to be... and sooner I leave=
 this place,  will be better for all...."

The femme started to walke quick=
ly towards opposite exit, sobbing and crying in low voice.  
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Monday, April 11, 2005 12:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Wolf Tears


  Malice:

 =
 For a breif moment, a low growl escaped the chrome male.  The emotion in h=
is optics mirrored his namesake.  a breif glimpse of the viral anger manife=
sted, his instability showing his true unpredictable nature.  His firm grip=
 instantly became vise like, his face twisted into a hellish glare.  But th=
e moment passed and he let her go, and stepped back, stuggling to regain co=
ntrol.  After a moment of inner battle, he calmed.

  "That is why... at an=
y given moment I can snap.  It is nothing against you, but you would not be=
 prepared to face me.  You fell in love with the calm and sincere Malice, y=
ou have no idea what I can do when I am not so nice and sincere.  It is for=
 your safety.  I am no saint.  I have killed in most cruel ways, I may not =
be much better than Unicron.  But I want you to be safe, that is why you mu=
st keep your distance from me.  Wolfblade understands the risks better, and=
 I would not be able to hurt her as easily.  I will tell you what I will te=
ll her.  Stay away from me when I am angry or going to fight.  It is not sa=
fe for anyone.  I still love you, but it must be..."

  He took a step back=
.

  "From a distance.  You can find another to hold close in my place, lov=
e is notoriously fickle."
